name: Spinnerets
description:
This game is local multiplayer. You'll need to grab a friend to enjoy it.

------------------------------------------------------------

How to play: choose a button for your character on startup. To charge, hold the button down. To fire a projectile, release it. Survive to be the last one standing!

------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 47. The theme was "Stuck in a Loop."

Graphics: Paint.NET

Audio: SFXR, Audacity, my Casio keyboard

Programming: Python with PyGame. I used pre-made tools for UI buttons and loading spritesheets.
